job description:
Docurated is looking for talented Data Scientists!

As a Data Scientist at Docurated, youll be working with a very unique dataset. Were able to gather fairly complete internal document usage data for our enterprise customers. Combining this with our complete view of structured and unstructured document data, were able to make a lot of magic happen. Our product is the future of enterprise insight.

How We Do It!

The entire team has a strong collaborative, learning culture. Together we do group classes, internal tech talks, paper reviews, book clubs, and more. We come from schools like Stanford, MIT, and Harvard. We leverage new ideas, tools and approaches. We hack aggressively and have a high GSD quotient, along with a consistently high level of excitement and inspiration.

What We're Looking For:
  • Academic and practical experience with large-scale machine learning, NLP, and information retrieval.
  • History of shipping
  • Drive to work in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment
  • Product/customer focus: youre able to integrate customer needs with technical possibilities, limited by nothing but your imagination.
Perks and Benefits:
  • Highly competitive compensation package
  • We cover 100% of health benefits (seriously, this is real)
  • A company Mac or PC
  • Free breakfast, lunch, snacks, drinks.
  • Membership to the Chelsea Piers gym
  • Access to summer Hampton's house
Our mission is to help our customers see and understanding everything about their content.
